articles.title: Etsy sells secondhand clothing marketplace Depop to eBay for $1.2B
articles.description: The deal comes nearly five years after Etsy purchased Depop for $1.62 billion, at a time when secondhand clothing apps were gaining traction during
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Hacking conference Def Con bans three people linked to Epstein
articles.description: The Def Con hacking conference banned hackers Pablos Holman and Vincenzo Iozzo, as well as former MIT Media Lab director Joichi Ito, from attending
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Is your startup’s check engine light on? Google Cloud’s VP explains what to do
articles.description: Startup founders are being pushed to move faster than ever, using AI while facing tighter funding, rising infrastructure costs, and more pressure to
articles.author: Theresa Loconsolo

articles.title: A startup called Germ becomes the first private messenger that launches directly from Bluesky’s app
articles.description: Social network Bluesky now offers private messaging by integrating the startup Germ's E2E encrypted messenger natively in its app.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: SeatGeek and Spotify team up to offer concert ticket sales inside the music platform
articles.description: This is a strategic win for SeatGeek. With direct placement in the Spotify app, SeatGeek is positioned to reach millions of active music fans as they
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Amazon halts Blue Jay robotics project after less than 6 months
articles.description: Amazon said Blue Jay's core tech will be used for other robotics projects and the employees who worked on it were moved to other projects.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Mastodon, a decentralized alternative to X, plans to target creators with new features
articles.description: Mastodon is looking to grow its open source, decentralized social network with new features aimed at creators.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Data breach at fintech giant Figure affects close to a million customers
articles.description: The Figure data breach allowed hackers to steal customer names, dates of birth, physical addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: World Labs lands $1B, with $200M from Autodesk, to bring world models into 3D workflows
articles.description: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Google debuts $499 Pixel 10a
articles.description: The smartphone is available for preorder now with shipments starting March 5. It comes in Lavender, Berry, Fog, and Obsidian.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Audible’s new ‘Read & Listen’ feature syncs your Kindle e-books with audiobooks
articles.description: The feature will require customers to buy both versions of the title, but at a discounted price.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: X continues to bet on vertical video with its latest update
articles.description: X's new immersive video player is designed to offer a more mobile-friendly experience, optimized especially for portrait-oriented videos.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Snapchat+ tops 25M subscribers, driving company’s direct revenue ARR to $1B
articles.description: The revenue milestone comes as Snap has added additional paid offerings outside of its core Snapchat+ subscription over the past year to diversify
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Google adds music-generation capabilities to the Gemini app
articles.description: Users will be able to use text, images, and videos as a reference to generate music.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Kana emerges from stealth with $15M to build flexible AI agents for marketers
articles.description: Kana, a new AI marketing startup from the founders of Rapt and Krux, has raised $15 million to build customizable, agent-based marketing tools.
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.title: This former Microsoft PM thinks she can unseat CyberArk in 18 months
articles.description: Though crowded, the identity management market seems eager for new solutions, and Venice is finding traction.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Microsoft says Office bug exposed customers’ confidential emails to Copilot AI
articles.description: Microsoft said the bug meant that its Copilot AI chatbot was reading and summarizing paying customers' confidential emails, bypassing data-protection
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: OpenAI pushes into higher education as India seeks to scale AI skills
articles.description: OpenAI says its India education partnerships aim to reach more than 100,000 students, faculty, and staff over the next year.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Tesla dodges 30-day suspension in California after removing Autopilot
articles.description: The decision comes a month after Tesla discontinued Autopilot, its basic driver-assistance system.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Intellexa’s Predator spyware used to hack iPhone of journalist in Angola, research says
articles.description: Amnesty International says it found evidence that a government customer of Intellexa, a sanctioned surveillance vendor, used its Predator spyware
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
